thread.title: Iconic Mughal Gardens opens to public from today
thread.title_full: Iconic Mughal Gardens opens to public from today

author: ANI
title: Iconic Mughal Gardens opens to public from today
text:
Iconic Mughal Gardens opens to public from today Iconic Mughal Gardens opens to public from today The iconic Mughal Gardens of the Rashtrapati Bhavan will open for the general public from today. President Pranab Mukherjee inaugurated the gardens, as part of the annual Udyanotsav yesterday. By: ANI | New Delhi | Updated: February 5, 2017 10:36 AM President Pranab Mukherjee walks in the Mughal Gardens at Rashtrapati Bhavan in New Delhi on Saturday. (PTI ) 
The iconic Mughal Gardens of the Rashtrapati Bhavan will open for the general public from today. President Pranab Mukherjee inaugurated the gardens, as part of the annual Udyanotsav yesterday. 
The iconic Mughal Gardens of the Rashtrapati Bhavan will open for the general public from today. President Pranab Mukherjee inaugurated the gardens, as part of the annual Udyanotsav yesterday. 
About 14 thousand Tulip bulbs in seven different colors like red, orange, pink and purple have been planted in the gardens. 
Watch This Also: 
Several beds of roses, including both new and heritage varieties are the main attraction of the Long garden. 
Flower Carpets in magnificent designs will be on display in the Central Lawns revealing the skill and craft of the gardeners of Rashtrapati Bhavan. The Gardens will remain open till 12th of next month except on Mondays which are maintenance days.
